extDesc.message: Convertit automatiquement les prix en ligne en heures de travail.
extDesc.description: Brief description of the extension's function.

instructions.message: Il suffit d'entrer votre revenu ci-dessous :
instructions.description: Description of what the user must do for the extension to work.

yearly.description: Pay frequency option for salary payment.

currencyFormat.description: Header for the form section that configures symbols for the thousands' place and the decimal place Time Is Money will use to identify currency values online.

comma.description: An option for the thousands' place.

commas.description: An option for the decimal place.

spacesAndDots.description: An option for the thousands' place.

dot.description: An option for the decimal place.

amountErr.message: Erreur ! Le montant indiqué est incorrect.
amountErr.description: Tell the user that the value entered for 'Income amount' is invalid and the form was not saved.

saveSuccess.description: Let the user know their preferences were successfully saved.

incomeAmount.description: The amount of money the user gets each pay period.

payFrequency.description: How often the user is paid.

disable.description: Option to pause the extension if it is currently running.

enable.description: Option to resume the extension if it is currently paused.
